summary: Implements a Django template loader that searches for template files inside installed Python eggs (distribution packages). It defines an Origin subclass to represent the location of a template within an egg and a Loader class that locates, reads, and returns template source code, handling missing templates and deprecation warnings.
business_intent: Enable Django projects to reuse and render templates that are bundled with thirdâ€‘party applications distributed as eggs, simplifying template discovery across installed packages.
